body:
# Asgardex V1.40.2 🚀 
## Release Notes Summary

This release introduces headless and modal migrations, Zcash support, and enhances the user experience with fixes for asset selection, portfolio view bonds route, and updated trade swap tolerance for the new thornode. Technical improvements include typed ERC20 scripts, stricter type checking, and a resolution for bundle conflicts via manual chunking. 

## What's Changed
* feat: headless migration by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/772
* chore: fix asset select and switch button by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/777
* types for erc20 scripts by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/767
* update trade swap tolerance bps for new thornode by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/779
* tighten type checking by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/778
* chore: update bonds route at portfolio view by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/783
* feat: modal migration by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/782
* Add zcash by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/770
* Fix bundle conflict with manual chunk by @hippocampus-web3 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/784
* Chore/update change log by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/786


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.40.1...v1.40.2

# Asgardex v1.40.1  🚀 

## Main Changes
- **Features & Improvements**
  - Cardano client added for viewing balances and sending transactions
  - Performance improvements with slip tolerance adjustments
  - Enhanced wallet creation flow
  - Updated to React 18.3
  - Updated to electron-builder 24.13
  - Updated social icons
  - Removed styled-components and antd
  - Widened phrase view
  - Removed React.FC generic
  - Updated ledger and xchainjs dependencies
  - Yarn dedupe optimization

- **Bug Fixes**
  - Fixed Mayachain quoting issue
  - Resolved Ledger Mac error
  - Added missing event handlers
  - Small fixes and improvements
  
## What's Changed
* Release/v1.40.0 by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/747
* feat: enhanced wallet creation flow by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/745
* update to react 18.3 by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/725
* yarn dedupe by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/749
* add mising event handlers undefined for now by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/751
* feat: update social icons by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/752
* Fix ledger by @hippocampus-web3 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/755
* update to electron-builder 24.13 by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/750
* feat: styled components removal by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/756
* chore: make the phrase view wider by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/758
* chore: antd and styled-components removal by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/759
* Added cardano package by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/623
* chore: remove React.FC generic by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/761
* Chore/small fixes by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/764
* update ledger deps by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/765
* update xchainjs packages by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/768


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.40.0...v1.40.1

# ASGARDEX v1.40.0 🚀 

Recent updates to Asgardex Desktop include modernizing the build system with Electron 35, Node 22, and ESM configs, alongside dependency deduplication and TypeScript enhancements. New features like TCY support, protocol switch for swap quotes, and UI improvements were added, with fixes for Storybook,  and chain asset logic.


## What's Changed
* chore: update the color of modal description by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/697
* Remove CRA / react-scripts by @hippocampus-web3 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/698
* dedupe dependencies, v2 by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/704
* Revert "dedupe recast" by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/706
* update to electron 35 and node 22 (take two) by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/699
* update eslint plugins (the easy ones) by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/709
* Fix storybook build by @hippocampus-web3 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/711
* feat: add host flag under server options by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/713
* appease eslint-plugin-import by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/710
* Update Mac OS Name by @Naq302 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/708
* update eslint-plugin-security by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/714
* convert to eslint flat config by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/721
* modularize fp-ts imports by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/718
* convert tailwind & postcss to ESM config by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/722
* update to @typescript-eslint/* 7.18 by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/720
* turn require() statements into import statements by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/723
* quiet some new(?) lints in typescript-eslint 8.x by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/724
* update evm params for etherscan v2 by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/717
* fix imports of CJS modules by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/726
* feat: TCY support by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/705
* Task/yarn lock check by @Naq302 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/727
* add back missing build-time TypeScript validation by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/731
* fix logic around chainAsset Amounts for cosmos send by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/732
* wip from ant-design-icons to hero icons by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/656
* enable recommended import lints, fix duplicate imports by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/733
* feat: add protocol switch for swap quote by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/737
* Chore/update version number by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/738
* fix up ESM-ified notarize build hook by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/740
* add TypeScript checking to main process code (electron.js) by @dynst in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/735
* feat: add TCY view mask by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/742
* Fix/buildnames by @Naq302 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/744


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.30.6...v1.40.0

# Asgardex v1.30.6 🚀

## Major Fixes
- Send THOR Kuji and TCY Assets on Keystore and Ledger
- TCY Staking and Unstaking from Deposit on Keystore and Ledger
- Fixed Secured Asset Swapping
- Created Mac OS 13 and 14 builds

## What's Changed
* Trunk fixes and updated CI by @Naq302 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/685
* fixed error with secured assets by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/688
* Create second Mac OS build by @Naq302 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/689
* feat: asset select filter and tooltip for footer icons by @cinnamoroll6130 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/690
* fixed secured asset quoting by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/691
* Fix/xchain thorchain tcy by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/692
* support thor.* tokens by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/693
* update version by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/695
* add logic for tcy staking by @underthesun49 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/694

## New Contributors
* @underthesun49 made their first contribution in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/694

#ASGARDEX v1.30.5 🚀 
## Overview
Efforts made to improve performance, lighten package and stabilise endpoints. 

## What's Changed
* Release/v1.30.4 by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/658

* Revert "update to eslint 9.25" by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/668

* updated xchain-* by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/673
* Add TCY draft by @GrassRootsCrypto in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/674
* de-duplicate code & fixed fee bound error on avax by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/676
* removing saver buttons and files by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/677
* Added Trunk and eslint security, no corrections yet by @GrassRootsCrypto in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/662
* update e left logic by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/681
* Update workflow versions and permissions by @Naq302 in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/679
* update fee bound and service worker by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/684
* updated trade screen UI by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/678
* fix mimir Pause Lp issue by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/680

## New Contributors
* @dynst made their first contribution in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/666
* @Naq302 made their first contribution in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/679

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.30.4...v1.30.5

# Asgardex V1.30.1 🚀 
* BaseChain Swapping and LP'ing 
* Secured Asset Previewing.  No swapping yet. 

## What's Changed
* Release/v1.30.0 by @Thorian1te in https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/572

# ASGARDEX 🚀  1.22.8 (2024-11-05)
## ATTENTION. Do NOT use Ledger on this version with any of the UTXO chains. 

- Base & solana clients wallet functionality only. That is until Thorchain adds a Base pool. Solana will be tradable on chain flip soon 
- Affiliate fee bps raised from 10 to 30bps. Under 1000$ is affiliate free and will remain this way. 
- Improved Trade asset experience 
## add

- solana client [#439](https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/447)
- base client [#444] (https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/458)
- buy & update MayaNames [#322] (https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/467)

## Updates/Fixes

- update bonds view under wallet tab [#445](https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/452)
- fixed the color of tx timer [#459](https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/459)
- redesign token whitelist modal [#465](https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/465)
- remove assets from icon in settings [#469](https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/464)
- update base affiliate fee & interact form memo check [#468](https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/pull/464)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/asgardex/asgardex-desktop/compare/v1.22.7...v1.22.8
